content.rendered:
It is more important to study the underlying principles of intelligence than to duplicate an exemplar. The quest of “Artificial Flight” only succeeded when the Wright brothers stopped imitating birds and started learning about aerodynamics.

~ STUART RUSSELL, PETER NORVIG IN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE : A MODERN APPROACH, 4TH EDITION.

This section contains the list of projects and term papers that I have completed, and I am really proud sharing of them.

I have further divided the project list into 5 subdomains and their details have been shared in the corresponding pages :

  • Electronics and Embedded systems
  • Software Development
  • Robotics
  • AI – ML
  • Human Machine Interface

An additional page { “others” } has been added to list general projects that do not fall under these categories.
